name: LaiXi
label: One desktop, hundreds of phones, batch simplified!
maker_introduction:
@luobaishunThank you for the thoughtful question! Let me break this down in two parts:Ôºå1Ô∏è‚É£ Phone Farm core value scenario:
‚Ä¢ E-commerce matrix operation - manage synchronous listing/promotion of 500+ store accounts (such as TikTok Shop batch operation)
‚Ä¢ Mobile game studio - 200+ device automatic brush initial number + cross-region testing, improve game publishing ROI
‚Ä¢ Social media growth - 100+ accounts automatically raise the number/interaction/Posting, avoiding the risk of single account limit on the platform
‚Ä¢ Data acquisition - Diversified configuration of device fingerprint to achieve high-precision crawler anti-blocking (10 times more effective than pure IP proxy)
2Ô∏è‚É£ The essential difference between Laixi and cloud mobile:
‚ñ´Ô∏è Hybrid architecture benefits - support both physical device clusters (to ensure account authenticity) and access to cloud phones (through our AndroidBot protocol)
‚ñ´Ô∏è cost subversion - Managing the cost of 100 physical devices ‚âà20 cloud mobile phones (measured data)
‚ñ´Ô∏è Control granularity - cloud phone apis are typically limited, while Laixi supports ADB level depth manipulation

name: WoolyAI Acceleration Service
label: GPU Service with GPU Core and Memory Resources Used billing
maker_introduction:
üìå
Hi, We‚Äôre a small team of OS, virtualization, and ML engineers, and after three years of development, we‚Äôre thrilled to launch the beta of our CUDA abstraction layer! We decouple the Kernel Shader execution from applications that use CUDA into a Wooly Abstraction layer. In this abstraction layer, we compile these to a new binary, and Shaders are compiled into a Wooly Instruction Set. At runtime, Kernel Shader launch events initiate a transfer of Shader over the network from a CPU host to a GPU host, where they are recompiled. Their execution is managed by Wooly Server software to achieve maximum GPU resource utilization, isolation between workloads, and cross-compatibility with hardware vendors before being converted to be passed on to the respective GPU hardware runtime and drivers. In principle, the wooly abstraction layer is similar to an Operating System, which sits on top of the hardware and enables the most efficient and reliable execution of multiple workloads.
We built a GPU Cloud service(WoolyAi Acceleration Service) using this abstraction layer with "Actual GPU Resources Used" billing, NOT "GPU Time Used" billing.

Looking forward to getting your feedback and comments.
Upvote

name: Magicam
label: Real time face swapping for any stream or meeting
maker_introduction:
üìå
üöÄ Magicam 2.0 is Here ‚Äì Bigger, Better, and More Magical! üöÄ

Hey PH community! üëã Ethan here, and I couldn‚Äôt be more excited to share Magicam‚Äôs second launch with you all! Being back on Product Hunt feels like coming home, and we‚Äôre beyond grateful for the support and feedback that helped shape this new version.

For those new to Magicam, it‚Äôs an AI-powered face-swapping app that works in real-time‚Äîperfect for video calls, live streams, and more. Plus, it allows you to swap faces in pre-recorded videos with just one click! Whether for work, fun, or creative projects, Magicam brings a touch of AI magic to everyday life. ‚ú®

What‚Äôs New in Magicam 2.0?
üîä Voice Clone ‚Äì Don‚Äôt just look like them‚Äîsound like them too! Upload a voice sample, and Magicam will transform your voice to match. Pair it with face swap for the ultimate transformation.
üñºÔ∏è LivePortrait ‚Äì Ever wished a photo could come to life? Now it can. Upload any image‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs a real person, a painting, or a 3D model‚Äîand bring it to life with your own movements.
üé¨ Next-Level Video Face Swap ‚Äì Upload a video, let Magicam detect faces, pick a new face, and swap instantly. No complex editing, just one-click magic.
üéõÔ∏è Advanced Customization Panel ‚Äì We‚Äôve kept our signature one-click seamless swaps, but now you get full control. Fine-tune the details to get the exact look you want.
üé≠ More powerful real-time face swapping function ‚Äì Through the upgrade of ai technology, the ability to swap faces in real-time scenarios such as meetings or live broadcasts has become more natural and smooth.

We built Magicam 2.0 to make AI creativity more fun, accessible, and powerful‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre a creator, a tech enthusiast, or just someone who loves experimenting with AI.

üí° Special Launch Offer: From March 9 to March 16, use PHXMAGIC20 at checkout to get 20% off any paid plan!

We‚Äôd love to hear your thoughts! Drop a comment, test it out, and let us know what you think. Your feedback helps us improve and innovate! üöÄüíú

name: Unreal Speech
label: Fast & Affordable Text-to-Speech API
maker_introduction:
üìå
Hello builders! üëã

I created Unreal Speech after wanting to listen to blogs instead of reading them, but finding existing text-to-speech options both expensive and robotic-sounding.

When the open-source Kokoro model was released, we leveraged our infrastructure expertise to make it production-ready. The result? A high-quality voice API that's incredibly cost-effective for high-volume and long-form content.

Key benefits:
- 48 natural-sounding voices across 8 languages
- Ultra-fast 300ms streaming with word-level timestamps
- Generate up to 10 hours of audio in a single request
- Fraction of the cost compared to other TTS providers
- 250K characters free to get you started

If you're building applications that need voice capabilities but don't want the hassle of deploying and scaling models yourself, Unreal Speech is the solution you've been waiting for.

I'd love to hear what you're building and how we might help!

Thanks,
Eric
Upvote
(20)

description: Cut text-to-speech costs. 11x cheaper than 11Labs. Production-ready. Stream audio + word-level timestamps. 300ms latency. Generate up to 10 hours of audio in one request. 48 voices, 8 languages. 250K chars free.

name: Streak Hunter
label: Never miss a day on product hunt
maker_introduction:
One of my biggest private pains was that I lost my PH streak twice last year. üòø

I did a little bit of research and didn't find a function built into PH to remind me of my streak.

At this moment, "STREAK HUNTER" came into the world! ü§©

I know this isn't the biggest pain for many of you guys, but some of you may feel what I say and need a daily reminder for the streak.

Now you have it, and the best part is - it's completely free and this forever. I don't want to charge anything for this. Maybe I'll advertise my own tools inside this tool one day, but STREAK HUNTER will never have a paid plan. I promise.

It's a nice lightweight solution, not many functions.

Please give me your feedback, guys. Only with your feedback can I make this product even better! üêù
description: Set up personalized daily email reminders to ensure you never break your ProductHunt voting streak. Track your progress and stay motivated with StreakHunter.com.
